```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```
```{r}
starbucks <- read.csv("data/starbucks_drinkMenu_expanded.csv")
```

```{r}
summary(starbucks)
```

```{r}
variable.names(starbucks)
```

```{r}
names(starbucks)
```
2. 
```{r}
select(starbucks, Beverage_category, Beverage, Beverage_prep, Calories)
```
3.
```{r}
mutate(starbucks, calorie_diff = (135 - Calories), .after = Calories)
```
4.
```{r}
calories <- summarise(starbucks, Beverage, Calories, Beverage_category)
calories
```

```{r}
arrange(calories, desc(Calories))

```
Most calories:
White Chocolate Mocha (Without Whipped Cream)
    White Chocolate Mocha (Without Whipped Cream)
    Java Chip (Without Whipped Cream)
    
    
```{r}
arrange(calories, (Calories))
```
Tazo Tea x 3 have the least calories
5.
```{r}
summarise(starbucks, Beverage_prep, Calories)
```
6.
```{r}
summarise(starbucks = mean(Calories, na.rm = TRUE))
```
